price: 55. [Jusufas (Juozapas)] tarė: „Paskirk mane šalies sandėliams (prižiūrėti). Aš tikrai saugosiu juos išmintingai.“ (kaip Egipto finansų ministras)
arabic: قَالَ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي عَلَىٰ خَزَآئِنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ إِنِّي حَفِيظٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla ij'ʿalnī ʿalā khazāini al-arḍi innī ḥafīẓun ʿalīmun
